Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
WebPython is a web-application development toolkit written in the Python 
programming language. It contains an object relational database layer, portable
over MySQL and PostgreSQL; a document templating engine complete with simple
built-in automation; and a mechanism to store Python objects in an SQL database,
among other stuff.
info.name: WebPython
info.html_description: WebPython is a web-application development toolkit written in the Python programming language. It contains an object relational database layer, portable over MySQL and PostgreSQL; a document templating engine complete with simple built-in automation; and a mechanism to store Python objects in an SQL database, among other stuff.
